definitions.definition: To remove ambiguities from; to make less ambiguous ; to clarify or specify which of multiple possibilities applies – e.g., possible meanings of an ambiguous statement – or to invite or require this.
To distinguish one word or lexical unit ( from a different one which has a similar form ).

main_definition: To remove ambiguities from; to make less ambiguous ; to clarify or specify which of multiple possibilities applies – e.g., possible meanings of an ambiguous statement – or to invite or require this.
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) To distinguish one word or lexical unit ( from a different one which has a similar form ).
